text: (wisthara karanne: jabir (rali) thuman, mulashraya: muslim 65).
kapunu podi angillak ridi mathaka
namuth mul wara sithima dushkarayi.
ekthara pa්rasiddha pa්racharaka aayathanayak mangin sidu kala nirupana shilpin thora ganime sammukha parikshanayaka di diyaniya nirupikawak kirima sandaha mawakagen a...
2016 agosthu masa 06 wanida meratata pamina athi aya nawathath pasugiya sapthambar masa 18 wanida eeshrayalaya bala gos thibenawa.
e්kata thawa deshapalana ka්ramawedayakuth hadanawa.
thamange wade karaganna aya witharane inne..
ada sita me hadawatha obe rajyayi -
bandumkara chodanawa dadamima karaganimin mudal labagena pudgalan, janadhipathi komisame warthawa nikuth kirimath samagama alosiyas mahathawa magaharimin siti.
gedara wada karana katitiyata kanna dunne naha.
eyin pramanawath paridi mama da pariharanaya karamin ambaudaru gnyathi mithradinta agahingakam athi ayata da parithyaga kelemi.
hithe thibuna lokuma baya eeka...
ee atharathura parlimenthuwa kandawimata kathanayakawarayata illimak kerena athsan pethsamakda wirodhathakaruwan wisin sakas karanu daknata labini.
ithin dostharalath umbaala api wagema honda naraka dekama ekathu wunu minissu neda kiyala pahadili karannath ekka rasawath kathawak kiyannam…
moko me kipi?
owun me bawa gamatada danwana ladi.
eheth me siyalla haraha peni yanne demala sandhanaya thula pawathna ugra bauddha wirodhaya nowanneda?

jalaya sapayima[sanskaranaya] wasun damimen pasu thawanakata jalaya sapayiya yuthuya.bija pala wimata thethamanaya awashya bawin bijawalata ha pala walata hani nowana se jalaya sapayiya yuthuya.pohora yedima awashyanami jalaya samanga misha්rakala yuriya isima kala hakiya.
obe awashyatha ha obe padiya danne obayi.
galle hodatama ugannana prasidda pasalak wechcha ape iskole patangaththa gaman siduwune amuthuma deyak.
paligaththe”yi thawa kenek asiya.

ee pemwathata pemwathiyan dedenaki.
ee widiyata jiwitha kalaya purawatama kampanayak athi kala pothak thamayi awurudu gananawakata pera punchi kalaye di kiyawapu “ gahanun dedenek ” kiyana pariwarthana potha.

6 jathiya anuwa janagahana thorathuru
ohu riyaduru mahatheki.
aapada kotas kipayakata bedanawa.
ese wuwada awinishchithakam nisa apata nishchithawa pawara athi de athapasu kirimen apa waradikaruwan bawata pathnowiya yuthuya.
me anuwa panchendrayan ha buddhiya upayogi karaganimin shuddha wu kuraanaye (51-20,21) wakyaya pawasana aakarayata thiranaya kirimayi saba buddhimath kriyawa wanne.
(kalaya dirgha karaganimata awashyanam likhithawa danumdi anumathiya labagatha yuthuya.)
aya boliwudaye wadima mudalak aya karana rangana shilpiniyan athara randi siti.

ow, api denna sathutin aadaren innawata godak aya kamathi na, mama dansin sho ekakata wideshagatha wunahamath hithanne ruwanwa dala giya kiyala, ape samajaya nitharama balanne waradi widiyata, ee nisa mama kiyanne kawda kiyala danagena jiwitha wena kenek, habayi ee wage katha mage kanata ahunoth mama ee kenagen munatama ahanawa.
wena krama gana nalin mahatha bahubhutha dodawa athath ewani krama athi bawata sakshi natha.
jan huyi-binge sohongaba wana debinmyo pihitiye myonryun (명릉; ryun yanna rajunge saha rajiniyange sohongab sandaha bhawitha we) sohon pihiti siyoryun sohon athara ya.
ee thula anethwa sagawa thabima ya.
eeth ee adahasa wisheshayenma sathi antha paththarayaka mulma puwatha widiyata pol gedi akurin pala wima nam kihipa sarayakma hithanna oona karunak.
methek kal kala yahapath kriya pamanayi wadagath.

honda sahakariyak labannath, aa samanga pawathina premaya mulumahath diwiya thulama pawathwa gannath wishala wiyadamak dariya yuthuya.ee mudala hari hamba karagannata bari wuwahoth jiwithaya agadhayak desata adennatath bari natha.me nisa piriminta siduwa thibenne wadiyen mahansi wennataya.eya hudek rakiyawaka nirathawana awadhiye pamanak kala yuththak nowe.igena ganna labala awadhiye sitama eeta huruwiya yuthuya.ese nathiwa “nikamaku” wuwahoth mahapolowe adiya gasannata bariwanu atha.
diwiye siyalu duk susum
parawal kochchara thibunath methanata langawima sandaha sudusuma marga gana wisheshayen salaka baliya yuthuyi.
ema nama thamayi sangawu rediyo bikanaya sewime kridawatath aran thibenne.
awashya nam goni mahana katu saha goni nul pahasu milata sapaya diya haka.
obe denetha gini pupuru men dilisenne man da?
pasuwa pemwatha hamu wu pemwathiya dedena suhadawa wen wimata yojana kara atha.
monatharam kapawimak karala thiyanawada rawige nona rawi wenuwen.

mage nama rohan nilantha..ekadas namasiya anu deke thama man ipadune...ee kiyanne dan patta nakiyi...awurudu 91k ne...ha ha pura kiyala man mulinma giye kirimatiyana bauddha balikawata...ha...aa mokakda ee harupe..aa na na man yanakota eeka mishra pasalak..me lagadi thamayi garls onli kale....ethakota eeka kirimatiyana kanitu widuhala..ithin ooke napuru mis kenekta bayawela thamayi allapu iskoleta panne..eeka namin shri dharmarama maha widuhala..kohomin kohomin hari awurudu 8k unne eke thamayi...2008 pedana sissa nayaka pattamath gaththa.....(karapu balu wada dannawa nam iskolen pannanawa).....oo lewal karala yanthan eelewal karanna puluwan wenna pas wela giye dhammissara jathika pasalata..katu kala awurudu
ara wenas wuna kiwwa film balilla ada ee wage thanaka natharawela thiyenne.

ifthikar, siri thilakasiri, thissa liyanasuriya, san sorufawathi nadan, sugathapala senarath yapa, di.ef.kariyakarawana mahathma mahathmin wetha sammana pradanayata ekwiya.madhya madhyasthanaye madhya paryeshana pusthakalaya da janadhipathithumage nirikshanayata lak kerunu athara pancha bala, kendraya saha madhya madhyasthanaya pilibanda prakashanada piliganimata ekwiya.janathawata yahapath mathawada idiripath karanu wenuwata wenath wadapiliwelak madhya mangin kriyathmaka kerena bawa penwa dun janadhipathiwaraya ee nisa jathika samangiya, sanwardhanaya, godanagimata gena yana wadapiliwela niwaradiwa janathawa wetha idiripath kirimata nohakiwa athi bawa kiwe ya.prajathanthrawadaye mura ballan lesa handinwena madhya ayukthiyatath asadharanayatath wiruddhawa baya nathiwa katha karana atharama janathawage sanwardhanaya, anagatha parapura wenuwen peni sitiya yuthu bawath janadhipathiwaraya pawasiya.ayukthiyen yukthiyath, asadharanayen sadharanayath, adharmayen dharmayath thora bera ganime manga janathawata penwime wagakima madhya sathu bawath janadhipathiwaraya kiwe ya.saru de saruwath nisaru de nisaruwath wen kara ganimata janathawata maga penwiya yuthu bawath janadhipathiwaraya wadiduratath kiwe ya.parisara amathi anura pi්rayadarshana yapa, wadabalana janamadhya amathi ha aarthika sanwardhana niyojya amathi lakshman yapa abewardhana, parlimenthu manthri manusha nanayakkara, janamadhya amathyansha lekam dabliw.
